description: Compare French schématiser, from Ancient Greek σχημᾰτίζω (skhēmatízō, “I assume a position”).

verbs.description: schematize (third-person singular simple present schematizes, present participle schematizing, simple past and past participle schematized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To organize according to a scheme.
(transitive) To distort and simplify for the purpose of highlighting certain characteristics.
(intransitive) To make a plan in outline.
